title: Must we remove dirt from under our nails before wudu or ghusl? #Assim #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: if there is dirt in our nails must we remove the dirt from our nails before with the dirt that is underneath your nails does not impact your or your W but of course hygienically speaking it's best that you keep your nails according to the Sunnah always short and clean but it has no impact on the the validity of that
